content:
To attack Kharkiv on March 20, the Russian army used a Kh-35 missile.

About thisreportedVolodymyr Timoshko, Head of the National Police in Kharkiv Oblast.

"According to the explosives of the State Emergency Service, the Barbarians have used the anti -carab X35 missile in the region today," he wrote.

As reported by the Armyinform, today around 13:00 the terrorist countryShe has donerocket stroke on Kharkiv. The Russian army kissed a civilian object located in the city industry. Number of victims due to a blow to Kharkovhas grownUp to 8. It is also known about five dead.
title: Kharkov was hit by an anti-ship missile X-35
description: This was reported by the Head of the National Police in Kharkiv Oblast Volodymyr Timoshko in ...
author: Army Inform
